headline: Corteva Inc (NYSE:CTVA): A Bullish Investment Perspective
summary: We came across a long thesis on Corteva Inc (NYSE:CTVA) on ValueInvestorsClub by Glory_Warriors. In this article we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on CTVA. The company’s shares were trading at $60.92 when this thesis was published, vs. closing price of $59.63 on Jan 13th. Corteva Inc (NYSE:CTVA), a pure-play agricultural inputs company spun off […]
